content: This pass is only valid for those holding non-Japanese passports and with a Temporary Visitor visa under the Immigration Control and Refugee Recognition Act. Foreign residents in Japan, whether working, participating in a study-abroad program, or such, are not eligible for this pass. Anyone ineligible who is found using this pass will be fined for misuse.

We will not process refunds for 2D barcode e-tickets for whatever reason. However, after exchange, unused physical tickets can be partially refunded at a JR West Midori no Madoguchi ticket office (not directly through us); however, a handling fee of 10% of the retail price will be charged
Only one e-ticket per passport can be exchanged at a time. Individual customers are not allowed to purchase or exchange more than one of the same ticket for the same use period
Multiple people are not allowed to share a ticket; the ticket is valid only for the person whose name is indicated on it
